I know the picture above is weird, but it makes me feel happy

body:
*SPOILERS AHEAD*

Who was in denial when Tony and Nat died? Just me? Ok.

To be honest, I didn’t cry at the theater. I cried the day after, in my bedroom when it finally hit me that they’re actually gone.

...
I guess this is a Peter and Stephen stan blog now.

summary:
Stephen: I thought you said it was a technical problem.
Tony: Technically, I was the problem.
body:
Stephen: I thought you said it was a technical problem.
Tony: Technically, I was the problem.

dialogue.name: Stephen
dialogue.label: Stephen:
dialogue.phrase: I thought you said it was a technical problem.

body:
*SPOILER ALERT*

As much as I hated to see Tony die, I know that it had to happen, this was the way his character arc had to end. But, one thing I’m glad about, is that Peter and Pepper were the last ones to talk to him.

“Please don’t go Tony” was such a heartbreaking moment for me as Peter had just reunited with his ‘iron dad’ and now he knows he’s going to lose him again.

I also thought that Pepper’s “you can rest now” line was really important and sweet because she was letting Tony know that they are all gonna be okay, even when he’s gone, so he can rest in peace.

Tony’s death was inevitable, from the start of him becoming iron man, because he is such an arrogant, confident, self-assured man who would willingly sacrifice his life to save everyone else’s, as shown in this scene. As sad as it makes me that he is gone, he hasn’t died in vain

I've been looking for you day and night
cuz I'm not gonna leave you behind
summary:
I found a note with your name 
And a picture of us 
Even though it was framed 
And covered in dust 
It’s the map in my mind that...
text:
I found a note with your name
And a picture of us
Even though it was framed
And covered in dust
It’s the map in my mind that sends me on my way
source: Tony Stark in Endgame

body:
[Endgame Spoilers]

Was thinking about the fact that Steve went back and stayed with Peggy in the past, however it would be pretty difficult to hide him from Howard and everyone she worked with at shield. So basically what I’m saying is Steve totally met baby Tony and became his godfather.

blog.name: lovingcoldplayertonystark
blog.title: Earth's Best Defender
blog.description:
Hi friends! I'm Sammy, 23 year old girl living in the U.S. I run a multifandom blog, mainly Tony Stark love, Coldplay, Lucifer, Good Omens
Forever, Torchwood, Doctor Who, Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D and all things Marvel, Glee, Lord of the Rings/The Hobbit, Merlin, The Walking Dead, New Girl,...

summary: I don't think I'll ever be able to put into words how much I love Tony Stark and how much he will always mean to me. In the end...
body: I don’t think I’ll ever be able to put into words how much I love Tony Stark and how much he will always mean to me. In the end he made the ultimate sacrifice. He chose saving everyone over his own happiness. You can’t get more heroic than that. Tony’s heart was so big that he chose to wrap it around the universe giving his own life in the process. I’m broken, I’m wrecked, I’m devastated. I’ll never feel the same way about a character again. If he really had to go I couldn’t have asked for a better send off for him. It was beautiful it was heartbreaking and it was powerful. I’ve never cried that much in my life. Thank you for everything RDJ we love you and Tony 3000. I’m gonna go sobb some more now

reblog.comment: I don’t think I’ll ever be able to put into words how much I love Tony Stark and how much he will always mean to me. In the end he made the ultimate sacrifice. He chose saving everyone over his own happiness. You can’t get more heroic than that. Tony’s heart was so big that he chose to wrap it around the universe giving his own life in the process. I’m broken, I’m wrecked, I’m devastated. I’ll never feel the same way about a character again. If he really had to go I couldn’t have asked for a better send off for him. It was beautiful it was heartbreaking and it was powerful. I’ve never cried that much in my life. Thank you for everything RDJ we love you and Tony 3000. I’m gonna go sobb some more now

He chose saving everyone over his own happiness. You can’t get more heroic than that. Tony’s heart was so big that he chose to wrap it around the universe giving his own life in the process. I’m broken, I’m wrecked, I’m devastated. I’ll never feel the same way about a character again. If he really had to go I couldn’t have asked for a better send off for him. It was beautiful it was heartbreaking and it was powerful. I’ve never cried that much in my life. Thank you for everything RDJ we love you and Tony 3000. I’m gonna go sobb some more now
trail.content: I don’t think I’ll ever be able to put into words how much I love Tony Stark and how much he will always mean to me. In the end he made the ultimate sacrifice. He chose saving everyone over his own happiness. You can’t get more heroic than that. Tony’s heart was so big that he chose to wrap it around the universe giving his own life in the process. I’m broken, I’m wrecked, I’m devastated. I’ll never feel the same way about a character again. If he really had to go I couldn’t have asked for a better send off for him. It was beautiful it was heartbreaking and it was powerful. I’ve never cried that much in my life. Thank you for everything RDJ we love you and Tony 3000. I’m gonna go sobb some more now

tags: too many characters to hashtag lol
summary: I saw endgame last night and WOW! I laughed, I cried, I cheered, I booed. That was the best superhero movie ever! I just loved...
body:
I saw endgame last night and WOW!

I laughed, I cried, I cheered, I booed. That was the best superhero movie ever! I just loved it. *SPOILER* Steve and Tony and Nat all dining had me sobbing like a baby, but my friend bough a tissue box so we gucci. I can’t wait for stage 4, and absolutely cannot wait to see the new Avengers Assemble!
